name: CVE-2020-8164
description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists in rails < 5.2.4.3, rails < 6.0.3.1 which can allow an attacker to supply information can be inadvertently leaked fromStrong Parameters.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:rubyonrails:rails:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:rubyonrails:rails:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:8.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:10.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:opensuse:leap:15.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:opensuse:backports_sle:15.0:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:opensuse:leap:15.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
